pkgmetadata.longdescription: Managing and Building of Quarterly Life Tables // Manages, builds and computes statistics and datasets for the construction of quarterly (sub-annual) life tables by exploiting micro-data from either a general or an insured population. References: Pava and Lled (2022) doi:10.1111/rssa.12769. Pava and Lled (2023) doi:10.1017/asb.2023.16. Pava and Lled (2025) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0315937. Una herramienta automtica para el calculo de productos de vida') for supporting this research.
